interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: LaClaire Foaming Botanical Facial Cleanser with Enriched Antioxidant Botanicals - Nourishing pH Balanced Face Wash (50 ml/1.65 oz), Made in the USA
Review Date: 2018/10/03
Store: LaClaire
Product Description: ['A gentle foaming cleanser utilizing natural beneficial antioxidant botanicals to draw out impurities, excess oil and pollutants. Our foaming cleanser removes debris without disrupting skin’s delicate PH balance. Use our cleanser to detoxify, purify and condition the skin’s natural barrier.']
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Foam', 'Skin Type': 'Oily, Combination, Dry, Normal', 'Brand': 'LaClaire', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.75 x 5.5 x 1.63 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '891040000682', 'Manufacturer': 'LaClaire'}
Review Text: I wanted to love this cleanser, but my first disappointment was the giant box it was wrapped in. It's seemed to be like unwrapping an onion, with a box, then a smaller box, and paper. The bottle is wrapped in tissue paper and unfortunately the cleanser had leaked all over the paper and turned it a dark yellow color. This is a foaming cleanser and when mixed with water, the consistency is rather thick. I suffered from breakouts all over my forehead during the week or two using this cleanser which is a very unusual spot for me to break out. I had some other treatments affecting my hormones at the same time, so I can't say for certain that my skin condition was due to this product alone, but it certainly didn't help. When I switched to using Cetaphil cleanser, the breakouts cleared up almost immediately. Unfortunately this was a pass for me.
Review Title: Too much packaging, gave me breakouts
Rating: 2.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Hair Clippers and Trimers for Men Cordless Rechargeable Hair Cutter Kit MayBuy ['Hair Clippers and Trimers for Men Cordless Rechargeable Hair Cutter Kit'] {'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Shaving', 'Color': 'Black', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Brand': 'MayBuy', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 2.99 x 0.71 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'PINK55', 'Batteries': '1 Lithium Ion batteries required. (included)', 'UPC': '682500548413', 'Manufacturer': 'Maybuy'} There is plenty to like about this kit.

First, I like that it's USB powered. That is a major convenience, especially if using in a professional setting. Secondly, it's got good balance and is ergonomically pleasing. A great feature when you're using is regularly.

My sister, who has been a professional for 20 years, said it was among the sharpest (in a good way!) she's ever used. Obviously this is huge when working on customers and you don't want to pulling hair out when you're trying to cut it.

With the myriad attachments, there's really very little you can't do with it. And best of all, the price is great for what you get. I would recommend this for both home and professional settings.

The battery length isn't great, but it also charges really quickly, so it's simply a matter of being mindful of it. Great for home or the salon LaClaire Foaming Botanical Facial Cleanser with Enriched Antioxidant Botanicals - Nourishing pH Balanced Face Wash (50 ml/1.65 oz), Made in the USA LaClaire ['A gentle foaming cleanser utilizing natural beneficial antioxidant botanicals to draw out impurities, excess oil and pollutants. Our foaming cleanser removes debris without disrupting skin’s delicate PH balance. profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Usage:** Prefers versatile grooming tools suitable for both personal and professional use, while also showing interest in skincare products.
- **Convenience Focus:** Values rechargeable and USB-powered devices, along with practical packaging that minimizes waste.
- **Ergonomics and Design:** Appreciates well-balanced and ergonomic designs that enhance comfort during extended use, extending this preference to skincare products that are easy to handle.
- **Performance Quality:** Prioritizes sharpness and efficiency in grooming tools and effectiveness in skincare, influenced by professional recommendations and personal experiences.
- **Value for Money:** Looks for products that offer great features at an affordable price, indicated by a careful approach to purchasing skincare that meets specific skin needs without overspending.
- **Attachments Variety:** Enjoys grooming tools with multiple attachments, suggesting a need for flexibility in grooming tasks, while also appreciating the versatility of skincare products for different skin types.
- **Battery Management Awareness:** Acknowledges the importance of battery life and charging time, reflecting a practical approach to device maintenance and product shelf life.

The recent skincare experience indicates a cautious approach to trying new products, with a focus on effectiveness and practical packaging. The user demonstrates a clear preference for high-quality, functional grooming tools and skincare solutions that cater to both home and professional environments, while remaining mindful of potential skin reactions.
